body_html:
Thanks for the help! But it still doesn't work.

Use 0.2.3 doesn't solve the problem. This time error message becomes:

ERROR: /scratch/peiguo/tensor-flow/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/kernels/BUILD:1267:1: undeclared inclusion(s) in rule '//tensorflow/core/kernels:batchtospace_op_gpu':
this rule is missing dependency declarations for the following files included by 'tensorflow/core/kernels/batchtospace_op_gpu.cu.cc':
'/home/.slash_usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/4.8/include-fixed/limits.h'
'/home/.slash_usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/4.8/include-fixed/syslimits.h'
'/home/.slash_usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/4.8/include/stddef.h'
'/home/.slash_usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/4.8/include/stdarg.h'
'/home/.slash_usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/4.8/include/stdint.h'
'/home/.slash_usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/4.8/include/x86intrin.h'
'/home/.slash_usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/4.8/include/ia32intrin.h'
'/home/.slash_usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/4.8/include/mmintrin.h'
'/home/.slash_usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/4.8/include/xmmintrin.h'
'/home/.slash_usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/4.8/include/mm_malloc.h'
'/home/.slash_usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/4.8/include/emmintrin.h'
'/home/.slash_usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/4.8/include/immintrin.h'
'/home/.slash_usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/4.8/include/fxsrintrin.h'
'/home/.slash_usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/4.8/include/adxintrin.h'
'/home/.slash_usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/4.8/include/float.h'.
nvcc warning : option '--relaxed-constexpr' has been deprecated and replaced by option '--expt-relaxed-constexpr'.
nvcc warning : option '--relaxed-constexpr' has been deprecated and replaced by option '--expt-relaxed-constexpr'.
Target //tensorflow/cc:tutorials_example_trainer failed to build

# CROSSTOOL:

minor_version: ""

cpu: "k8"
toolchain_identifier: "local"
}

default_toolchain {
cpu: "armeabi-v7a"
toolchain_identifier: "stub_armeabi-v7a"
}
